Constructor Detail

BittrexUtils

public BittrexUtils(String market,
                    String API_KEY,
                    String SECRET)
Constructor containing market, API_KEY, and SECRET.

Parameters:
market - market to communicate with, provided as "coin-coin". Example: "BTC-LTC"
API_KEY - api key from Bittrex
SECRET - api secret from Bittrex

BittrexUtils

public BittrexUtils(String market,
                    String API_KEY,
                    String SECRET,
                    int timeout)
Constructor containing market, API_KEY, SECRET, and timeout.

Parameters:
market - market to communicate with, provided as "coin-coin". Example: "BTC-LTC"
API_KEY - api key from Bittrex
SECRET - api secret from Bittrex
timeout - amount of tries to make per each request
Method Detail

cancelOrder

public boolean cancelOrder(String uuid)
Cancels an order.

Parameters:
uuid - uuid of the order
Returns:
true for success, false for failure

getAvailableBalance

public double getAvailableBalance(String currency)
Returns the available balance of a given currency.

Parameters:
currency - currency ticker to get balance for. Example: "BTC"
Returns:
a double representing the balance

getCommunicator

public BittrexCommunicator getCommunicator()
Returns the communicator for raw data.

Returns:
a BittrexCommunicator

getOrderRates

public double[] getOrderRates(boolean buyOrSell)
Returns an array of rates of orders only.

Parameters:
buyOrSell - true for buy book false for sell book
Returns:
an array of rates

getOrderStatistics

public Map<String,Double> getOrderStatistics(String uuid)
Returns a summary of the main data in the order provided.

Parameters:
uuid - the uuid of the order
Returns:
a map of order data, containing "Quantity", "QuantityRemaining", and "Rate" paired with double values, null if fetching failed

getTimeout

public int getTimeout()
Returns the amount of times the communicator will make a request.

Returns:
the amount of times

getTopOrder

public Map<String,Double> getTopOrder(boolean buyOrSell)
Gets the first order that matches given conditions, starting from the top of the order book.

Parameters:
buyOrSell - true for looking in the buy order book, false for looking in the sell order book
Returns:
a map of order data, containing "Quantity" and "Rate" paired with double values, null if fetching failed

getTopOrder

public Map<String,Double> getTopOrder(boolean buyOrSell,
                                      double underBTCAmount)
Gets the first order that matches given conditions, starting from the top of the order book.

Parameters:
buyOrSell - true for looking in the buy order book, false for looking in the sell order book
underBTCAmount - the amount of bitcoins down an order must be
Returns:
a map of order data, containing "Quantity" and "Rate" paired with double values, null if fetching failed

getTopOrder

public Map<String,Double> getTopOrder(boolean buyOrSell,
                                      double underBTCAmount,
                                      double worseThanRate)
Gets the first order that matches given conditions, starting from the top of the order book.

Parameters:
buyOrSell - true for looking in the buy order book, false for looking in the sell order book
underBTCAmount - the amount of bitcoins down an order must be
worseThanRate - the rate you are willing to buy or sell at
Returns:
a map of order data, containing "Quantity" and "Rate" paired with double values, null if fetching failed, -1 for both if no order is found

placeOrder

public String placeOrder(boolean buyOrSell,
                         double quantity,
                         double rate)
Places an order with the provided parameters.

Parameters:
buyOrSell - true for placing a buy order, false for placing a sell order
quantity - the amount of coins being bought
rate - the rate of coins being bought
Returns:
uuid of the order, null if order failed

setTimeout

public void setTimeout(int timeout)
Sets the amount of times the communicator will make a request.

Parameters:
timeout - number of times
